description: A crossword-style word puzzle game where players connect letters from a circular hub to fill a crossword grid.
goal: Implement a high-fidelity 'Wordscape' style game that follows the platform's standardized patterns and leverages the existing dictionary infrastructure.
requirements: Crossword-style grid that displays correctly on all screen sizes
Circular word wheel input with touch gesture support for swiping between letters
Game logic to differentiate between words in the grid and 'bonus' dictionary words
Level system with increasing complexity (shuffled from a level data set)
Standardized HUD integration (Score, Level, High Score)
Visual feedback for valid words, invalid attempts, and bonus word discovery
Hint mechanism to reveal letters in the grid
No external assets - use emojis and Tailwind gradients
constraints: Must use existing DictionaryService (Trie) for word validation
Must follow Logic Layer + UI Layer separation pattern
Must adhere to 'no-scroll' mobile viewport requirements
Must integrate with use-game-session and standardized headers
